info: “Before three dimensional images, before highly realistic characters, before orchestrated soundtracks, there was 8-bit video games. Graphics were simple, the music simpler. Now, decades later, 8-bit music has returned, more powerful than ever thanks to Trey Frey, a young man from Shepherdstown WV, with a modded Gameboy and a skill for taking classic Nintendo sounds and turning them into 8-bit gold.” – The Billboard
